name: Blocklets 2D
description:
Blocklets 2D is a small puzzle game made for the Thinky Puzzle Game Jam.
Move the Blocklets to their respectively colored finish pads while watching out for the colored lasers!

This game is currently a working prototype. The developer console might show up in the begining for some reason (you can just close it to get rid of it). Please excuse the bugs!

    Controls:
  1. WASD keys / Arrow Keys: Move Blocklet
  2. Q/E keys or Mouse: Switch Blocklet Control
  3. Z key: undo
  4. R key: reset level
